title: Jam Kamal calls on Governor Balochistan
content:
QUETTA, Jul 14 (APP): Chief Minister Balochistan Mir Jam Kamal Khan Wednesday called on Governor Balochistan Syed Zahoor Ahmed Agha here at Governor House.
On the occasion, the Governor Balochistan and the Chief Minister exchanged their views regarding law and order situation in the province, discussed issues of mutual interest and overall situation of development projects and political issues.
They also agreed that practical steps would be taken for public welfare and development of the province in order to remove backwardness from the areas.
